WEBINAR: TASTE AND ODOUR CONTROL IN DRINKING WATER TREATMENT
Taste and odour, particularly related to algae, has become an increasingly common concern in water treatment plants. This webinar will focus on advances in taste and odour control, reviewing both proven and emerging treatment approaches and assessing the advantages and disadvantages of each.
Webinar details
On: 6 May 2015 Speaker: Simon Breese, AECOM
All webinars are broadcast three times a day to enable global attendance:
